thread.section_title: Babyonlinedress 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Babyonlinedress 的点评意见 | babyonlinedress.com
thread.title: Rachel

author: Rachel
title: Rachel
text: I ordered a prom dress with custom measurements. The dress came quickly and when I took it out of the package I immediately noticed how cheaply it was made and how it looked absolutely nothing like the picture! I ordered a dress of obvious plus size measurements and the arm holes for the dress looked like they were made for a small child to fit into! I've been contacting them for almost a week trying to get a refund and I've gotten no where! Never order from this place!
